scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm run deploy:all
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:common && concurrently "npm:deploy:marketing" "npm:deploy:no-ent" "npm:deploy:sign-in" "npm:deploy:register" && npm run deploy:lcu-display && npm run deploy:lcu-builder && npm run deploy:forge
scripts.deploy:common: npm version patch --prefix projects/common && node --max-old-space-size=8192 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build common && npm run styles:common && npm publish ./dist/common --access public
scripts.deploy:forge: npm version patch --prefix projects/forge && lcu daf Switch --project=forge --env=prod && node --max-old-space-size=8192 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build forge --prod && npm publish ./dist/forge --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-builder: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-builder && lcu daf Switch --project=lcu-builder --env=prod && node --max-old-space-size=8192 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build lcu-builder --prod && npm publish ./dist/lcu-builder --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-display: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-display && lcu daf Switch --project=lcu-display --env=prod && node --max-old-space-size=8192 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build lcu-display --prod && npm publish ./dist/lcu-display --access public
scripts.deploy:marketing: npm version patch --prefix projects/marketing && lcu daf Switch --project=marketing --env=prod && node --max-old-space-size=8192 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build marketing --prod && npm publish ./dist/marketing --access public
scripts.deploy:no-ent: npm version patch --prefix projects/no-ent && lcu daf Switch --project=no-ent --env=prod && node --max-old-space-size=8192 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build no-ent --prod && npm publish ./dist/no-ent --access public
scripts.deploy:register: npm version patch --prefix projects/register && lcu daf Switch --project=register --env=prod && node --max-old-space-size=8192 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build register --prod && npm publish ./dist/register --access public
scripts.deploy:sign-in: npm version patch --prefix projects/sign-in && lcu daf Switch --project=sign-in --env=prod && node --max-old-space-size=8192 ./node_modules/@angular/cli/bin/ng build sign-in --prod && npm publish ./dist/sign-in --access public
scripts.styles:common: npm run styles:common:css && npm run styles:common:scss
